places_with_reviews.name: Radisson Blu Resort & Spa - Alibaug, India

reviews.text: Great place with a huge and maintained pool. Not too far from the beach. Food is costly but very tasty. Great facility for kids to spend those sunny afternoons. One big issue I had is that they still keep giving plastic bottled water. Every big hotel has gone green in that aspect and serves drinking water in rooms and in restaurants in glass bottles. Same goes for utilities in bathrooms etc. Something to look into urgently!

A perfect gateway from Mumbai. Loved the ambiance and hotel rooms and food. Only the service is little slow on crowded days.
Also good place with kiddos as the play zone and swimming pool is awesome

I recently had the pleasure of staying at this hotel, and I must say, it was an absolutely amazing experience. The hotel's ambiance is awesome, providing a sense of tranquility and relaxation from the moment you step in. The panoramic view from the hotel is breathtaking, offering a spectacular vista of the surroundings.

What impressed me the most was the sheer size of the property. It's vast and well-designed, ensuring that guests have more than enough space to explore and enjoy their time. The maintenance of the hotel is impeccable, with every corner spotlessly clean and well-kept.

One of the standout features of this hotel is the variety of activities it offers. There are so many things to do within the premises that you'll never find a dull moment. Whether you prefer to lounge by the pool, indulge in spa treatments, or engage in outdoor sports, the options are endless.

Moreover, for guests who love to explore the area, the hotel provides bicycles, allowing you to roam around conveniently and at your own pace. This added amenity truly enhances the overall experience, making it easy to venture out and discover the beauty of the surroundings.

Nice hotel. The rooms are very spacious. Housekeeping is very good but other services are a little bit immature. Food is not so great in the main restaurant, whereas the south Indian restaurant is very tasty. This property is a bit far away from the actual Alibaug beach (4.5 km).

The rooms & property are well maintained. The breakfast buffet is good. The taste of A la carte items were ranging from good to salty. The room service especially housekeeping should be a bit more prompt. We've to call the reception for WiFi details. Generally they are placed in the room in other hotels. Plus point - Cleaning of rooms are done daily without reminders. Personally, I was disappointed when the surprise element was missing even after confirming our tentative arrival time. Since it's a top end hotel,one expects more perfection. More dustbins should be placed across the property for ease in waste disposal.

places_with_reviews.name: Tropicana Resort & Spa Alibaug
address: Chondi Naka, Mapgaon, Alibag, Sogaon, Maharashtra 402201, India

reviews.text: First things first, this place has two routes to get in and out of here. One is really narrow and you may find heavy vehicles weaving in and out of this route. The second, leads to the city and is 1km long, though this one is better than the first in terms of traffic and not the quality of road. Secondly, The property in itself is still developing the last we checked but the developed part o it is really nice with outdoor spots to relax and enjoy the environment even during the day. Thirdly, the pool area was nice with pool for kids and adults with a lounging area nearby and its quiet. The rooms are comfortable, and the layout from the perspective of a blind individual is quite straightforward and I liked that, since I myself am totally blind. The premises is built in a township like manner and I liked walking around with my companions around it. There is adequate space for parking and one can book the villas as well though it is beneficial when there's a large group like let's say of 8 or 10 people. The individual rooms are quite nice as well.

Nice place for a quite retreat. Close to the beach, however the roads leading to the Resort is in very bad shape.
Well maintained pool & gardens.
Food (as part of the Club Mahindra) was very delicious, and the staffs are professional, courteous and helpful.

We were a big grp went to this resort looking at all the reviews with very high expectations and paying a good amt. We were very much disappointed with their service, food and also hospitality. I will not recommend this resort to anyone. Room service, food and cleanliness all were disappointing. Games in club house were all broken. Just big DISAPPOINTMENT. They took all the payment but didn't give us clean rooms instead of making prior bookings we got the rooms by 2 and we only had to go and follow up with housekeeping to clean our villa, all this took approx more 2.5 hrs. We had kids with us and all of us were waiting in bad heat to start with our holiday. Same thing happened next day for room cleaning and pool cleaning. Not happy.

One of the best resorts I’ve ever been. Spreaded in a very large area, parking by the villas and it only gets more breathtaking when you walk in. High quality rooms, clean washroom, a personal swimming pool and high quality service. Big green areas and parks all over the place. One can enjoy cycling, do adventure sports and other small games around the campus (Reasonable Charges applicable).Overall it was a pleasure to be at this resort. Please do visit and experience the magic when in Alibaug.

Nice, cosy and luxurious. Stayed in a pool villa - independent, includes four large bedrooms. Excellent for a big family get together. Just a minor issue that I faced, the villa does not have any way to let the occupants know that someone is waiting outside if each of them are inside the bedrooms.

places_with_reviews.name: Akshi Beach

reviews.text: One of the most peaceful and safe beach i have ever visited. Do visit this beach if you want to spend a peaceful time in the evening, enjoy the view with a beautiful sunset! There is no food option available here. Make sure to keep this place clean.

Best beach in alibagh in terms of peaceful and non cowded nature. Also their is a good hotel attached to this beach (Samara sea view homestay) if you like to stay near the beach. So you can never miss the sunset view.

This is one of the most peaceful and clean beaches near Alibag. It is very less crowded in the morning and evening. There are no water sports activities. If you really want to get a feel of Konkan, Akshi beach is the place to be. There are a few eating options available near the beach as well.

Relaxing beach with textured sandy shore that gives you a wave pool like experience during high tide. Value for money. And we stayed at the palace of peace located within a 20 minute walk from the beach. Truly an unexpected and unforgettable experience.

It is the best beach in Alibag ,hands down. This large beach lies on the side of a serene Konkan village amidist palm trees , it is so beautiful. If you are looking for a quiet beach with not much people running around and are someone who is looking for tranquility please head to no other beach but this one.

places_with_reviews.name: Casuarina The Beach Resort
address: Suruche Ban, Satad Bandar, Dist, Nagaon, Maharashtra 402203, India

reviews.text:
Resort is close to the beach. Well maintained, peaceful resort. Good staff, good breakfast, clean rooms. A swimming pool is available.
Breakfast is included in the package and variety is served that is the best part.

Only suggestion is to extend the time of dinner to 11.30PM as people come to relax so being flexible is helpful for visitors. And atleast have shade parking for Car.

Overall had a good experience.

This weekend we visited in this place
Best location with huge area.
Positive points :
Tasty Food
Clean swimming pool
Good maintenance
Polite staffs
Beach touch resort

Negative points :
1) Poor Service
2) Charges are higher as compared to rooms and service
3) charges that we paid its just accommodation others things are not included in that
4)They mentioned many things in menu card but half think’s are not available.
5) swing’s are only 2 in resort.

They should improve service and
Also need to improve rules for the break fast, lunch and dinner
Otherwise Good location and resort to chill

We booked the property for a day picnic and we were allotted one room. The rooms are spacious and clean. The washroom is also clean.

The food is okay but the canteen looks like a normal public canteen. Moderate cleanliness. The worst part is pathetic service. The common washroom and toilet is pathetic.

The property location is superb and the lawn and swimming pools is maintained. The beach access from the property is the best part.

Excellent resort by the beach
Just 2 min walk n u r in clean and pestine beach.
Rooms are clean and mainted
They have beautiful lawn with coconut trees giving cool breeze and Goa vibes
All watersports is just 10 min away so once u r in resorts u do not had go anywhere.
Perfect for families
Service is good
Also we want Jain food in b/f
So they specially prepared  poha for us
Food is good and with good quantity.
To our surprise as it was weekend there was live music
Which was excellent
Also midnight  around 2-30pm
We were in need of medicine which we got easily from reception.
Overall it's wonderful property with all facilities
Swimming pool, indoor games
And walkable by beach
Truly recommendable

Location is very good. Adjacent to the beach.
Rooms are clean and spacious

Service is okay, can be improved. Food quality is decent.

places_with_reviews.name: HOTEL MAPLE IVY
address: MV4Q+729, near Krushival Press, Dalinagar, Alibag, Maharashtra 402209, India

reviews.text:
Rooms spacious. Swimming pool well maintained. Good service.
Excellent Restaurant, must try their thin crust pizza. It was amazing. Resturant staff was very courteous. Overall good relaxing experience. Also, had small kids play area.
Pool has a nice shade so water is cool. It even has nice jacuzzi. Food is also good. I booked this hotel during my second visit as well

Good hotel. Good hygeine. Helpful staff. Decent food. Nice pool.

Overall good experience but midlly on the expensive side. Prices can be a bit lower.

A nice hotel. Had a pleasant stay for 2 nights and it was warm. Nice rooms and very clean bathroom with continuous hotwater. Food is very tasty in the in house restaurant Saffron. Swimming pool is indoors and kept clean. Breakfast buffet is good and reasonable.
Service was good with responsive staff. Overall reasonably priced hotel for family

this hotel is ok for 2 to 3 days... if you are here for more than a week.. you will get to know how hygiene this hotel and room is.. i am here for more than 15 days due to some work. and in the name of cleaning they are just passing their time. even the wash room they clean once in a week .just flush it and wash it through water...
i came here because i saw many good reviews...but after 2 to 3 days they started showing their originality ,even they will return your laundry in same used bag which you have given. some time they don't wash it just iron it without washing and give it to you.

these are only 4 pics that i am adding here...there are lots of such example...

places_with_reviews.name: Outpost@Alibaug
address: Alibag, Chorande, Mapgaon, Sogaon, Maharashtra 402201, India

reviews.text:
"Outpost at Alibaug is a slice of paradise nestled amidst nature's bounty! The property boasts spacious surroundings and lush greenery, creating a serene ambiance. The highlight is definitely the expansive swimming pool, perfect for a refreshing dip. With three in-house restaurants offering a variety of delicacies, dining here is a culinary delight.

For entertainment, the resort offers a plethora of options including a gaming room equipped with classic board games, pool table, squash court, and table tennis. Fitness enthusiasts can make use of the well-equipped gymnasium, while the badminton court adds to the fun. And who can forget the charming treehouse, adding a touch of whimsy to the experience.

The rooms are impeccably clean and comfortable, ensuring a relaxing stay. But what truly sets Outpost apart is its exceptional staff, whose hospitality is second to none. Highly recommend this haven for anyone seeking a memorable retreat in Alibaug!"

Went here for lunch today on a recommendation by a known person. We were a group of 25 people. The service was pathetic. Waiters don't turn up to take your order. Food takes an hour to come, after reminding them about your order that was placed an hour ago.

Totally avoid. They don't know how to run a place. 4 waiters at the sample place totally clueless on what's happening around!

A luxury retreat with calm and peaceful vibes. Never anticipated something of this sort in Alibaug. Definitely worth every penny. Their in-house Italian restaurant is one of the best, in fact never had such authentic Italian cuisine before. The pool side restaurant is relaxing. They have a spa, squash, table tennis, pool within their premises which adds to the whole package.

Stayed at Outpost over Xmas weekend. The rooms are Ill-maintained and overpriced. They need a fresh coat of paint and a whole lot of repair work ( random areas with Rust and wood chipping). Food at Terra was fine. Location is quite far from all beaches and any attractions.

The property is very far from the beaches or any other attractions. Since there were not many rooms occupied in the breakfast they didn’t keep buffet. So had to order from menu which wasn’t chargeable but then didn’t get more options to eat. The property is not maintained at all. The pricing for rooms are very high.

places_with_reviews.name: White House Beach Resort
address: Nagaon Bandar Rd, Nagaon, Maharashtra 402204, India

reviews.text:
I regret to inform you that my recent stay at the White House Resort was far from satisfactory. As a guest who has frequented numerous resorts, I am accustomed to a certain standard of service and amenities, which unfortunately were lacking during my visit.

Firstly, upon arrival, I was dismayed by the lack of attention from the staff. There seemed to be a disorganized check-in process, with no one readily available to assist guests with their luggage or provide any information about the resort facilities.

Furthermore, the condition of the room left much to be desired. It was evident that cleanliness was not a priority, as there were noticeable stains on the bedding and an unpleasant odor lingering in the air. Additionally, the furniture appeared worn-out and in need of replacement.

The dining experience was another disappointment. The restaurant was understaffed, leading to long wait times for both seating and service. The quality of the food was subpar, with several dishes being overcooked and lacking in flavor.

Overall, my experience at the White House Resort fell far short of expectations. I had hoped for a relaxing and enjoyable stay, but instead, I left feeling frustrated and dissatisfied. I urge management to address these issues promptly to ensure that future guests do not encounter similar

Resort is near the beach and because of wonderful facilities we booked it for second time. This resort is very nice. We had a booking for 2 days which we had to cancel after 1 day due to our child not being well. The hotel refunded our 1 day amount of Rs 3500 to us. The food and other services of the hotel are good. the staff is polite and ready to help

Very unhygienic and unclean.
1. Commod came off
2. Door latches broken
3. Curtain pipe fell off
4. No hanging hooks in washroom
5. Cockroaches and mosquitoes in the room
6. Unclean swimming pool with hair and what not
7. Unprofessional 'chapri' staff
8. The bedsheets and blankets weren't clean.
9. A fan's regulator was not working.
10. 2 of the lights were not working.

They do not have any hospitality, the room has cockroaches so you can guess what the kitchen must look like and the food would give you diarrhoea.
The staff was not talking nicely at all.
This place cannot even be called a resort. The whole place is run down as compared to what you see in pictures online. The pictures from Google look like from when this place was built.. we booked deluxe room and it was totally run down.  Just don't go here!

NEVER BEFORE EXPERIENCE
Had been to this place last weekend with my group of friends n kids.
We needed a break from our busy schedule... all working professional ladies.
DINNER was not laid completely till 11pm.
Heated arguments followed.
Many slept without eating.
Decided to leave the place at 1 am night...but gave a second thought....being group of ladies n kids.
Left next morning without tea,though had paid till afternoon lunch.
Arrogant owner.
No Courtesy towards ladies n kids.
Basic amenities.. unsatisfactory.
Be careful.

Food is pathetic. We ordered non veg starters and it felt like prepared in the morning. Had to call the manager atleast 4 times to take the dinner order. We also provided feed back after the dinner but he was least bothered instead asked us to pay it same time. They could have included it in the room stay charges. Rooms are not clean. Overall below average except for location which is near beach. Suggest to look for better options nearby.

places_with_reviews.name: Coconut Ivy Resort & Spa
address: Chendre, Alibag - Revas Rd, opp. M.I.D.C. Office, Alibag, Maharashtra 402201, India

reviews.text:
It was a nice experience here. Whenever I called for any services, the staff was ready to provide it. I was sitting outside my room and one of the staff approached me from far away with a chair and asked me to sit on the chair. It didn't end here, he asked me whether I need a table or not. I had a problem with my AC Remote, I specifically told the person that if it's not possible, leave it. His words were that you paid for all the services, you deserve all those. I called the room service, there was a problem with the telephone, the person on the other side shared his personal number and asked me to call whenever I needed anything throughout the night. I wonder why people here are posting negative negative reviews for the services. I didn't try the food here but as I've heard about it, it's not that good.
I will definitely recommend this place.

Service is pathetic, may be due to staff shortage. Attendant are also not well versed with items available with Kitchen / service.
In the morning also, tea is not available till 7.30am.
Dinner preparations are good but need to improve service/ presentation to ensure exclusivity ie different from a DHABA.

Location is easily accessible. Property is good. Rooms have scope for improvement. We had booked super deluxe with bath tub but still not upto the mark compared to rates which they charge. Bar and restaurant add value to the property. Service is good.

Broken swimming pool
Poorly maintained
Low class gentry.
Arrogant staff
No food option
Too costly for the price

Resort is nice and very close to market, beaches and Alibaug stand. Food is amazing and there are few popular restaurants right outside the resort too. Pool and surroundings are neat and clean however rooms are very old style and looks shady.

places_with_reviews.name: Acons Palm Beach

reviews.text: The Rooms were very clean and hygienic. The surroundings was peaceful enough to give break from the hustle & bustle of the city. Games room was exceptional. In house Food items are there but limited. Nevertheless, you can order food from the nearby restaurants. Overall a good, affordable and value for money stay.

We had booked 2 deluxe rooms during week days and had a great experience. Rooms were spacious and well maintained, service was good, staff was cooperative. Decent options in play area as well. Pricing is quite reasonable with respect to the area of room.

I had a fabulous stay at Acons Palm Beach.  It's a full one bedroom apartment. So the space is very big and spacious. The place is very clean and tidy. The staff were extremely polite. The receptionist was helpful with suggestions for places to visit in Alibaug. Lovely stay and we spent most of our evenings there. Looking forward to my next trip here
Very neat and clean spacious room. They have super polite staff for servicing. It was a great experience, definitely would recommend to anyone.

Comfortable stay. Rooms are spacious and clean, 1bhk is sufficient for 2-3 people. Location is bit outskirt from main market and bus stand, but can be reached via maps. Getting public transport is bit challenging but property has few auto drivers number, can contact and call them to location. Staff is generous, polite and responsive.

places_with_reviews.name: Bouganvillea Boutique Beach House
address: Nagaon Bandar Rd, Nagaon, Maharashtra 402204, India

reviews.text: I had a fantastic experience at this hotel with my family. Despite staying in a dorm due to high demand, the facilities were excellent. The clean swimming pool, diverse play area, and well-maintained surroundings impressed us. The restaurant served delicious food, and the 10-minute walk to the seashore added to the overall charm. Highly recommended for a family stay.

We had amazing stay at Bouganvillea Boutique Beach House last weekend...
I would highly highly recommend this property for stay as well as for good lip smacking food.

Hereby sharing my detailed feedback
1) Rooms - We booked group room...Room was neat & tidy , airy , spacious , cozy provided with all necessary amenities & toiletries inside..hot water 24*7 was available.Beds were clean & spacious.

2) Staff - Every staff including housekeeping , reception , restaurant was polite , kind , PROMPT , helpful , giving their best in every possible way.

3) Food - Veg & non veg food was outstanding , quantity was good..n service was fast..we had babies with us ...meal was also provided considering babies..
Complimentary Breakfast had many options with good taste.
For NON - VEGETARIANS it's a delight don't miss on it!
Seafood is a must try here!
Baby high chair is provided for feeding babies at the restaurant.

4) Ambience - kids area is good with kids activities..Indoor activities for adults  are good , swimming pool is maintained, over all hygiene is maintained well everywhere.

Excellent for kids and family stay.

We stayed with family here and must say experience was delightful. Rooms were neat and clean. Food was great. Staff was courteous and cooperative. Location is few minutes from Nagaon beach. Overall amazing experience.

The hotel amenities are good and worth the price you pay for. The swimming pool is clean and well maintained. The rooms are clean and cleaned everyday. The staff is cordial and prompt.
We interacted with Shravan at the front desk - he was very helpful and was very prompt with his work and also helped us with transport on the day of our check out.
Navjeet - helped us on all the days in the in house restaurant while serving us delicious food. He was very courteous and was well trained in hospitality.
The ambience is just so peaceful - well suited for a get away from the busy city life.

Had nice stay last weekend at Bouganvillea, Nagaon. Very well maintained property, clean, lush green, well maintained plants everywhere and very professional, attentive and friendly staff. The place offers cool and calm vibes. Restaurant is good, serving tasty food, complimentary breakfast was awesome! Room service is prompt. Rooms, although bit small for a family of 4, are neat and clean, offering outdoor seating at back side for drinks and small party. However, they must renovate and improve infrastructure of the room for the tariff they charge. Game zone is okay. Swimming pool and surrounding lighting looks very beautiful in the evening. Overall satisfying experience and would like to recommend travellers to stay at Bouganvillea for hassle-free, smooth and lovely stay.
